news-article-save.title: Save changes
news-article-save.message: The article has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

news-article-delete.title: Confirm delete
news-article-delete.message-single: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' article?
news-article-delete.message-many: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} articles?

news-article-content-save.title: Save changes
news-article-content-save.message: The content has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

news-article-content-delete.title: Confirm delete
news-article-content-delete.message-single: Are you sure you want to delete this localized to '{{language}}' language content?
news-article-content-delete.message-many: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} localized content items?

UseNewsPrefixInLinks.title: Use "news" prefix in links
UseNewsPrefixInLinks.description: Use "news" prefix in links (only for articles with active SEO)

UseStoreDefaultLanguage.title: Use store default language while searching articles
UseStoreDefaultLanguage.description: Use store default language while searching articles
